mapper.select: SELECT p.id, sum( CASE WHEN p.`status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS message_count, p.user_id, p.friend_id, p.sender_id, p.receiver_id, p.send_time, p.message_type, mi.message AS message_context, u.name AS send_name, u.pic AS send_img FROM ( SELECT * FROM private_message ORDER BY id DESC ) p LEFT JOIN message_info mi ON mi.id = p.message_id INNER JOIN yh u ON u.userid = friend_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.`status` != 3 GROUP BY p.friend_id ORDER BY p.send_time DESC LIMIT ${pageNo}, ${pageSize}
